Jawaab: In biraha Kugu soodhacan .

Su'aaal: Sababta gaar looga dhigay cuntooyinkaas jirdhiska ?
Jawaab: Waxa ay kubadan yihin baroteenka iyo nafaqada.

Su'aaal: Tawabarayaasha soomalida jirdhiska maleeyihin xirfadahas ?
Jawaab: Haa waa ay leeyihin.

Su'aaal: Xirfado hooda Masareeysa oo ma tawabari karaan feeryahano caalami ah ?
Jawaab: Haa waa ay tawabari karaan oo waa ay leeyihin xirfadahas.

Su'aaal: ciyaraha isbortiska maxay kaqayb qaatan?
Jawaab: Nabada iyo isdhexgalka.

Su'aaal: Dowlada soomaliyed dhaqale maku bixisaa ciyaraha.?
Jawaab: Haa waku bixisaa lkn kuma filna.

Su'aaal: Gobolada soomaliya garoomo caalami ah maleeyihin ?
Jawaab: Maya malahan garoomo caalami.

Su'aaal: Waa maxay sababta somali ay kaalmaha hore ukali wayday ciyaaraha caalamka ?
Jawaab: Uma dhamaystiran xirfadahoodi.

Su'aaal: Maxaa kahor istaagan in kaalmaha hore ay kasho soomaliya ?
Jawaab: Mahaystan macalamin sifican u tawabari kara.

Su'aaal: Sidee lagu hormarin karaa xirfada ciyaaryahanada soomaliya ?
Jawaab: In ay helaan macalamin xirfadohoda sareeso iyo koob ay ku jimicsadan.

Su'aaal: Ciyalka xafada ciyaarahe ubadan yihin ?
Jawaab: waxa ay ubadan yihin kubadacakta iyo jeeska .

Su'aaal: Ciyaraha game side isku tihin ?
Jawaab: Waan isku fiicanahay.

Su'aaal: Meeqa game aat ciyaartay ?
Jawaab: Waxa aan ciyaaray sida pubgy, ciyaraha kubadacakta iyo gaxaynta gawarida.

Su'aaal: Yarantada wax maka xasuusata ciyaraha game aat ciyartay ?
Jawaab: Haa waxbadan ka xasuusta.

Su'aaal: Sheek games ugu caansanaa aat abid ciyaarto ?
Jawaab: waa bubgy game

Su'aaal: Hore mau ciyaartay pubg game ?
Jawaab: Haa oo sanado badan.

Su'aaal: Sidee loo ciyaara pubgy game ?
Jawaab: waxaa loo ciyaraha hal hal qof, labo, sedax ilaa afar qof oo iska shanaya .

Su'aaal: Yaat ka xasuusata saxibadahagi hore ee laciyari jirtay
Jawaab: Wax badan aan kaxasusata .
